github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: type(scope): description
Include a 'Source-Provenance:' footer that details the source of the entry
Keep the subject line under 50 characters
For mobile captures, include 'Mobile-Context: device=[device_type], method=[capture_method], template=[template_used]'
Use Career Intelligence Space specific prefixes: feat, fix, docs, refactor, perf, test, chore, mobile, template, workflow
Scope should be lowercase with hyphens: mobile-ui, templates, docs, mobile-copilot, field-capture, compliance
Description should start with lowercase verb, be descriptive but concise, use present tense
For mobile field captures, use 'mobile' or 'mobile-copilot' scope and include Mobile-Context field
For template updates, use 'template' type with 'mobile' scope and include template name
For mobile workflow changes, use 'workflow' type with 'mobile-ui' scope
